statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT id, vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE scheduled_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT technician_id, scheduled_time FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE vehicle_id = 101 ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE technician_id IN (201, 205, 210);
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM maintenance_schedules GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT id, scheduled_time, technician_id FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE technician_id = 101 ORDER BY scheduled_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE vehicle_id = 500 AND maintenance_type = 'Tire Rotation';
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenances FROM maintenance_schedules GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT technician_id FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE scheduled_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY technician_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, scheduled_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC;
SELECT maintenance_type, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND technician_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type IN ('Oil Change','Brake Inspection','Tire Rotation') ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY maintenance_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician_name LIKE '%John%' AND maintenance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, DATE(maintenance_date) AS date_only FROM maintenance_logs WHERE vehicle_id = 3 ORDER BY date_only ASC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT mechanic_name, specialization FROM mechanic WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer, model FROM vehicle ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = '6e3bb89a-eb27-439e-9086-3e884d21b55b'
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer FROM vehicle WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota'
SELECT mechanic_name, specialization FROM mechanic WHERE specialization = 'ELECTRICAL' ORDER BY experience_years DESC
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule JOIN vehicle ON maintenance_schedule.vehicle_id = vehicle.vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT plate_number, manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_id, plate_number, manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT schedule_id, vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, plate_number, manufacturer FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT m.schedule_id, m.maintenance_type, m.maintenance_date, h.maintenance_status FROM maintenance_schedule m JOIN maintenance_history h ON m.schedule_id = h.schedule_id;
SELECT s.staff_name, s.staff_role, s.staff_contact, h.maintenance_type FROM maintenance_staff s JOIN maintenance_history h ON s.staff_id = h.history_id WHERE h.maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE year > 2018;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year, battery_capacity FROM ElectricVehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Technicians WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE year >= 2020;
SELECT v.make, v.model, m.maintenance_type, m.scheduled_date FROM ElectricVehicles v INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedule m ON v.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id;
SELECT t.first_name, t.last_name, l.maintenance_date, l.maintenance_details FROM Technicians t INNER JOIN MaintenanceLogs l ON t.technician_id = l.technician_id;
SELECT vh.vehicle_id, vh.maintenance_type, vh.maintenance_date, vh.notes, m.labor_hours FROM VehicleHistory vh LEFT JOIN MaintenanceLogs m ON vh.history_id = m.schedule_id;
